plain: Powder, White Squall, Forrest Gump, Top Gun, The Princess Bride, Raiders of the Lost Ark, Sphere, The Absent-Minded Professor, Saving Private Ryan, Ronin, A Bug's Life, Office Space, The Matrix, Entrapment, Austin Powers: The Spy Who Shagged Me, American Pie, Arlington Road, The Blair Witch Project, The Sixth Sense, American Beauty, Three Kings, Toy Story 2, Scent of a Woman, Erin Brockovich, Rules of Engagement, Parenthood, Caddyshack II, and Mr. Mom are all movies that I like. I like movies that are action-packed, have a good plot, and have a great musical score. I like movies that are set in different times and places, and that have a variety of visual styles. I like movies that are written well and have interesting themes. I like movies that are about an hour and a half long.
